participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Creative and empathetic, Sophie enjoys making others feel good about themselves. She has a strong sense of style and loves to express herself through her work.
participant_1.background: I grew up watching my mom make mashed potatoes, and I still love them to this day. I still like combat boots with babydoll dresses. I started my own business and now I'm a lot happier. I love my work and just got promoted. I have my own salon.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, Jake has a light-hearted outlook on life. He enjoys spending time with his partner and pets, and he has a passion for technology and creativity.
participant_2.background: I've been with my partner for five years. I'm terrible at math. I am a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta. I watch Face Off with my husband in our spare time. I have a cat and he is the light of my life.

content.text: Hey how's it going?
Hey! It's going well, just got home from work.  How about you?
It's going well. I just got promoted at my salon.
Oh wow, congratulations! That's awesome! What do you do at your salon?
I'm a hair stylist, and I specialize in curly hair.
Oh that's so cool! I have curly hair too.
Really? That's awesome! I love curly hair.
Me too! I'm glad to hear that you're so passionate about your work.
Thanks, I'm really happy with it. I love helping people feel confident and beautiful.
That's such a great goal. I'm sure you're doing a great job.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
What was your favorite part about getting promoted?
I think my favorite part was getting to be more creative with my work. I'm able to do more of what I love, and that makes me really happy.
That's awesome! I'm so glad to hear that.
Thanks.
What do you like to do for fun outside of work?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, go on hikes, and watch movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love to hike too.
Me too! It's so great to get outside and enjoy nature.
I agree! What are some of your favorite hikes?
I love hiking in the mountains, especially when the weather is nice.
That sounds amazing. I'd love to do that sometime.
We should go hiking together sometime!
That would be so much fun
